testName: Interest-Based Subject Selection Test for Class 9-10 Students

questions.questionText: Which board are you studying in?
Which subjects do you currently enjoy the most? (Select up to 3)
Which activity excites you the most?
options: Discussing social issues and debating opinions

questions.questionText: If you had a day to learn anything, what would you do?
options: Conduct chemical experiments in a lab
Read history books or watch documentaries
Write a story, poem, or script
Create an art piece or a new design

questions.questionText: When given a task in school, how do you prefer to approach it?
Which of these would you enjoy the most?
options: Studying the human body and medicine
Learning about how economies and businesses work
Investigating past events and their impact
Designing posters, animations, or visual content

questions.questionText: Which type of school project do you like the most?
options: Writing an essay or a story
Creating an art project or performance

questions.questionText: How do you like to solve problems?
options: By thinking creatively and outside the box
I love working with numbers and formulas
I am curious about how things work scientifically
I like exploring cultures, history, and politics
I am artistic and like to express myself visually

questions.questionText: If you could invent something, what would it be?
options: A policy to solve social issues
A unique fashion or design concept
